# Changelog

## [1.0.4] - 2021-06-29

- Node gyp binary finding moved into `train` method.

## [1.0.3] - 2021-05-12

### Fixed

- node-pre-gyp deprecation, updated to @mapbox/node-pre-gyp

## [1.0.2] - 2021-05-05

### Added

- This changelog

### Changed

- Removed native dependencies for image manipulation. (Switched from sharp to jimp).
